text: 1.21 1 Ko 15.2, Kol 3.8, Hib 2.3, 1 Pi 1.9, 2.1 Anɨb ak tek, tap tɨmel gɨl gach mɨdebɨm ak sek, tap si tap tɨmel gɨnɨgun agɨl gos nepɨm ak sek, mɨdupsek kelɨgɨl dɨyokɨnɨmɨb. Dɨyokɨl, binɨb tam okok tek mɨdɨl, takaw God gos nɨbi nab ayaŋ yɨmub ak dɨnɨmɨb. Takaw anɨb ak nɨbop gɨnɨmuŋ tek lek, God nɨbop tɨg asɨk dɨnɨgab.
